title: Leveraging engineered nanomaterials to support material circularity
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00110A, Perspective
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Leanne M. Gilbertson, Matthew J. Eckelman, Thomas L. Theis
There are numerous opportunities for nanomaterials and nanotechnology to support circular economy adoption. In this perspective, we present the important role engineered nanomaterials can play in advancing the circularity of bulk composite materials.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
